text: François Asselineau (born 1957), is a French civil servant and politician. Asslineau was active in Rassemblement pour la France (RPF) and Union for a Popular Movement (UMP) before founding his own party Popular Republican Union (UPR) in 2007.Qui est François Asselineau, le candidat de l’UPR à la présidentielle ? The party is in favor of France withdrawing from the EU, the Eurozone and NATO. Asslineau stood in the presidential election in 2012 and in the presidential election in 2017 where he got 0.92 percent in the first round.Présidentielle 2022 : qui est François Asselineau, candidat de l'Union populaire républicaine ? François Asselineau is educated at HEC Paris and ENA.François Asselineau, ex-candidat de l'UPR à l'élection présidentielle == References == Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:Alumni of HEC Paris Category:French politicians
title: François Asselineau
